00027 /// Internal function for checkindices
00028 /** \return 0 if we changed nothing. -1 for error. >0 if we changed stuff. */
00029 int checkindex(sqlite3 *db, const char *indexname, const char *tablename, const char *indexcolumn, int unique);

00032 int analyze(sqlite3 *db) {
00033     
00034     char *errmsg;
00035 
00036     if(SQLITE_OK != sqlite3_exec(db, "ANALYZE", NULL, NULL, &errmsg)) {
00037         fprintf(stderr, "ANALYZE error. SQL reported: %s\n", errmsg);
00038         sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00039         return -1;
00040     } else {
00041         printf("Ran ANALYZE\n");
00042         return 0;
00043     }
00044 }
00045 
00046 int checkintegrity(sqlite3 *db) {
00047     sqlite3_stmt *stmt;
00048     int rc;
00049     char pragma_sql[] = "PRAGMA integrity_check(1000)";
00050 
00051     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, pragma_sql, -1, &stmt, NULL))) {
00052         fprintf(stderr,"Error preparing SQL: (%i) %s\nSQL: \"%s\"\n", rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db), pragma_sql);
00053         return -1;
00054     }
00055 
00056     int found_error = 0;
00057     while(SQLITE_ROW == sqlite3_step(stmt)) {
00058         const char *integ = sqlite3_column_text(stmt, 0);
00059         if(0 != strcmp(integ, "ok")) found_error++;
00060         printf("Integrity response: %s\n", integ);
00061     }
00062 
00063     if(found_error > 0) {
00064         printf("Found error in integrity check. Cannot safely continue\n");
00065     }
00066 
00067     sqlite3_finalize(stmt);
00068 
00069     return found_error;
00070 }

00072 int checkobdecu(sqlite3 *db) {
00073     int retvalue = 0;
00074     int rc = 0;
00075     char *errmsg = NULL;
00076 
00077     sqlite3_stmt *stmt;
00078 
00079     char pragma_sql[256];
00080     snprintf(pragma_sql, sizeof(pragma_sql), "PRAGMA table_info(obd)");
00081 
00082     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, pragma_sql, -1, &stmt, NULL))) {
00083         fprintf(stderr,"Error preparing SQL: (%i) %s\nSQL: \"%s\"\n", rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db), pragma_sql);
00084         return -1;
00085     }
00086 
00087     int found_ecu_col = 0;
00088     while(SQLITE_ROW == sqlite3_step(stmt)) {
00089         if(0 == strcmp("ecu",sqlite3_column_text(stmt, 1))) {
00090             found_ecu_col = 1;
00091         }
00092     }
00093 
00094     sqlite3_finalize(stmt);
00095 
00096     if(0 == found_ecu_col) {
00097         char addcol_sql[256];
00098         snprintf(addcol_sql, sizeof(addcol_sql), "ALTER TABLE obd ADD ecu INTEGER DEFAULT 0");
00099 
00100         if(SQLITE_OK != sqlite3_exec(db, addcol_sql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg)) {
00101             fprintf(stderr, "ALTER db. SQL reported: %s\nSQL: \"%s\"\n", errmsg, addcol_sql);
00102             sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00103             return -1;
00104         } else {
00105             printf("Ran ALTER sql: \"%s\"\n", addcol_sql);
00106             retvalue++;
00107         }
00108     }
00109 
00110     return retvalue;
00111 }

00113 int checkindices(sqlite3 *db) {
00114     int retvalue = 0;
00115 
00116     int rc;
00117     rc = checkindex(db, "IDX_GPSTIME", "gps", "time", 0);
00118     if(-1 == rc) return -1;
00119     if(rc > 0) retvalue++;
00120 
00121     checkindex(db, "IDX_GPSTRIP", "gps", "trip", 0);
00122     if(-1 == rc) return -1;
00123     if(rc > 0) retvalue++;
00124 
00125     checkindex(db, "IDX_OBDTIME", "obd", "time", 0);
00126     if(-1 == rc) return -1;
00127     if(rc > 0) retvalue++;
00128 
00129     checkindex(db, "IDX_OBDTRIP", "obd", "trip", 0);
00130     if(-1 == rc) return -1;
00131     if(rc > 0) retvalue++;
00132 
00133     checkindex(db, "IDX_VINECU", "ecu", "vin,ecu", 1);
00134     if(-1 == rc) return -1;
00135     if(rc > 0) retvalue++;
00136 
00137     return retvalue;
00138 }
00139 
00140 int checkindex(sqlite3 *db, const char *indexname, const char *tablename, const char *indexcolumn, int unique) {
00141     int retvalue = 0;
00142 
00143     int rc;
00144 
00145     char idx_list_sql[64];
00146 
00147     snprintf(idx_list_sql, sizeof(idx_list_sql), "PRAGMA index_list(%s)", tablename);
00148     sqlite3_stmt *idx_list_stmt;
00149 
00150     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, idx_list_sql, -1, &idx_list_stmt, NULL))) {
00151         fprintf(stderr,"Error preparing SQL: (%i) %s\nSQL: \"%s\"\n", rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db), idx_list_sql);
00152         return -1;
00153     }
00154 
00155     int idx_found = 0;
00156     while(SQLITE_ROW == sqlite3_step(idx_list_stmt)) {
00157         const char *c = (const char *)sqlite3_column_text(idx_list_stmt, 1);
00158         if(0 == strcmp(indexname,c)) {
00159             printf("Found %s on table %s\n", indexname, tablename);
00160             idx_found++;
00161             break;
00162         }
00163     }
00164 
00165     sqlite3_finalize(idx_list_stmt);
00166 
00167     if(0 == idx_found) {
00168         char create_idx_sql[128];
00169         snprintf(create_idx_sql, sizeof(create_idx_sql), "CREATE %s INDEX %s ON %s (%s)",
00170             unique?"UNIQUE":"", indexname, tablename, indexcolumn);
00171 
00172         char *errmsg;
00173         if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_exec(db, create_idx_sql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg))) {
00174             fprintf(stderr, "Error creating idx. sqlite reported: %s\nSQL: \"%s\"\n", errmsg, create_idx_sql);
00175             sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00176             retvalue = -1;
00177         } else {
00178             printf("Added idx to %s(%s): \"%s\"\n", tablename, indexcolumn, create_idx_sql);
00179             retvalue++;
00180         }
00181     }
00182 
00183     return retvalue;
00184 }

00186 int checktripends(sqlite3 *db) {
00187     int retvalue = 0;
00188     char *errmsg = NULL;
00189 
00190     const char update_sql[] = "UPDATE trip SET end="
00191             "(SELECT (t2.start-0.01) AS newstart from trip t2 WHERE trip.tripid=t2.tripid+1) "
00192         "WHERE trip.end = -1";
00193 
00194     if(SQLITE_OK != sqlite3_exec(db, update_sql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg)) {
00195         fprintf(stderr, "UPDATE db. SQL reported: %s\nSQL: \"%s\"\n", errmsg, update_sql);
00196         sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00197         return -1;
00198     } else {
00199         printf("Ran UPDATE sql: \"%s\"\n", update_sql);
00200     }
00201 
00202     return retvalue;
00203 }

00205 int checktripids(sqlite3 *db, const char *table_name) {
00206     int retvalue = 0;
00207     int rc = 0;
00208     char *errmsg = NULL;
00209 
00210     sqlite3_stmt *stmt;
00211 
00212     char pragma_sql[256];
00213     snprintf(pragma_sql, sizeof(pragma_sql), "PRAGMA table_info(%s)", table_name);
00214 
00215     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, pragma_sql, -1, &stmt, NULL))) {
00216         fprintf(stderr,"Error preparing SQL: (%i) %s\nSQL: \"%s\"\n", rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db), pragma_sql);
00217         return -1;
00218     }
00219 
00220     int found_trip_col = 0;
00221     while(SQLITE_ROW == sqlite3_step(stmt)) {
00222         if(0 == strcmp("trip",sqlite3_column_text(stmt, 1))) {
00223             found_trip_col = 1;
00224         }
00225     }
00226 
00227     sqlite3_finalize(stmt);
00228 
00229     if(0 == found_trip_col) {
00230         char addcol_sql[256];
00231         snprintf(addcol_sql, sizeof(addcol_sql), "ALTER TABLE %s ADD trip INTEGER", table_name);
00232 
00233         if(SQLITE_OK != sqlite3_exec(db, addcol_sql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg)) {
00234             fprintf(stderr, "ALTER db. SQL reported: %s\nSQL: \"%s\"\n", errmsg, addcol_sql);
00235             sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00236             return -1;
00237         } else {
00238             printf("Ran ALTER sql: \"%s\"\n", addcol_sql);
00239         }
00240 
00241         sqlite3_stmt *trip_stmt;
00242         sqlite3_stmt *update_stmt;
00243         
00244         const char trip_sql[] = "SELECT tripid, start, end FROM trip";
00245         char update_sql[1024];
00246         snprintf(update_sql, sizeof(update_sql), "UPDATE %s SET trip=? WHERE time>? AND time<?", table_name);
00247 
00248         if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, update_sql, -1, &update_stmt, NULL))) {
00249             fprintf(stderr, "UPDATE db. SQL reported: %s\nSQL: \"%s\"\n", sqlite3_errmsg(db), update_sql);
00250             return -1;
00251         }
00252 
00253         if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, trip_sql, -1, &trip_stmt, NULL))) {
00254             fprintf(stderr, "Trip select: %s\nSQL: \"%s\"\n", sqlite3_errmsg(db), trip_sql);
00255             return -1;
00256         }
00257 
00258         while(SQLITE_ROW == sqlite3_step(trip_stmt)) {
00259             printf("Updating trip; trip %i: %f<time<%f\n",
00260                 sqlite3_column_int(trip_stmt, 0),
00261                 sqlite3_column_double(trip_stmt, 1),
00262                 sqlite3_column_double(trip_stmt, 2));
00263 
00264             sqlite3_reset(update_stmt);
00265             sqlite3_bind_int(update_stmt, 1, sqlite3_column_int(trip_stmt, 0));
00266             sqlite3_bind_double(update_stmt, 2, sqlite3_column_double(trip_stmt, 1));
00267             sqlite3_bind_double(update_stmt, 3, sqlite3_column_double(trip_stmt, 2));
00268             sqlite3_step(update_stmt);
00269         
00270             retvalue++;
00271         }
00272 
00273         sqlite3_finalize(update_stmt);
00274         sqlite3_finalize(trip_stmt);
00275     }
00276     
00277     return retvalue;
00278 }

00280 int checktimesagainstgps(sqlite3 *db) {
00281     char getdelta_sql[] = "SELECT trip,ROUND(AVG(gpstime-time)) FROM gps WHERE gpstime IS NOT NULL AND trip IS NOT NULL GROUP BY trip";
00282     char applydelta_gps_sql[] = "UPDATE gps SET time=time+? WHERE trip=?";
00283     char applydelta_obd_sql[] = "UPDATE obd SET time=time+? WHERE trip=?";
00284     char applydelta_trip_sql[] = "UPDATE trip SET start=start+?,end=end+? WHERE trip=?";
00285 }
